title: One Cyclist’s Obsession with Riding the Same Climb Over and Over Again
content:
There are plenty of climbs to choose from in Boulder, Colorado, but articles editor Fred Dreier obsessively rides up and down Flagstaff Road, clocking hundreds of ascents each year.

Read the full article at One Cyclist’s Obsession with Riding the Same Climb Over and Over Again on Velo.
author: Outside Online
